query:
query MatchQuery($matchKey: String!) {
  cricket_match(match_key: $matchKey) {
    key
    name
    short_name
    sub_title
    status
    start_at
    tournament {
      key
      name
      short_name
      __typename
    }
    metric_group
    sport
    winner
    teams {
      key
      value {
        key
        code
        name
        country_code
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }
    venue {
      key
      name
      city
      country {
        short_code
        code
        name
        official_name
        is_region
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }
    association {
      key
      code
      name
      country {
        short_code
        code
        name
        official_name
        is_region
        __typename
      }
      parent
      __typename
    }
    messages
    gender
    format
    title
    play_status
    start_at_local
    expected_start_at
    toss {
      called
      winner
      elected
      squad_announced
      __typename
    }
    play {
      first_batting
      day_number
      overs_per_innings
      reduced_overs
      target {
        balls
        runs
        dl_applied
        __typename
      }
      result {
        pom
        winner
        result_type
        msg
        __typename
      }
      innings_order
      innings {
        key
        value {
          index
          overs
          is_completed
          score_str
          score {
            runs
            balls
            fours
            sixes
            dot_balls
            run_rate
            __typename
          }
          wickets
          extra_runs {
            extra
            bye
            leg_bye
            wide
            no_ball
            penalty
            __typename
          }
          balls_breakup {
            balls
            dot_balls
            wides
            no_balls
            __typename
          }
          batting_order
          bowling_order
          wicket_order
          partnerships {
            begin_overs
            end_overs
            player_a_key
            player_a_score {
              runs
              balls
              fours
              sixes
              __typename
            }
            player_b_key
            player_b_score {
              runs
              balls
              fours
              sixes
              __typename
            }
            score {
              runs
              balls
              fours
              sixes
              run_rate
              __typename
            }
            is_completed
            __typename
          }
          __typename
        }
        __typename
      }
      live {
        innings
        batting_team
        bowling_team
        last_ball_key
        striker_key
        non_striker_key
        bowler_key
        match_break {
          reason
          duration_note
          __typename
        }
        score {
          runs
          balls
          wickets
          run_rate
          title
          overs
          msg_lead_by
          msg_trail_by
          __typename
        }
        required_score {
          runs
          title
          balls
          run_rate
          __typename
        }
        recent_overs {
          overnumber
          ball_keys
          __typename
        }
        recent_overs_repr {
          overnumber
          ball_repr
          __typename
        }
        recent_players {
          striker {
            key
            name
            stats {
              runs
              balls
              fours
              sixes
              dot_balls
              strike_rate
              __typename
            }
            __typename
          }
          non_striker {
            key
            name
            stats {
              runs
              balls
              fours
              sixes
              dot_balls
              strike_rate
              __typename
            }
            __typename
          }
          bowler {
            key
            name
            stats {
              balls
              runs
              economy
              wickets
              extras
              maiden_overs
              overs
              balls_breakup {
                dot_balls
                wides
                no_balls
                fours
                sixes
                __typename
              }
              __typename
            }
            __typename
          }
          prev_over_bowler {
            key
            name
            stats {
              balls
              runs
              economy
              wickets
              extras
              maiden_overs
              overs
              balls_breakup {
                dot_balls
                wides
                no_balls
                fours
                sixes
                __typename
              }
              __typename
            }
            __typename
          }
          __typename
        }
        __typename
      }
      related_balls {
        key
        value {
          key
          ball_type
          batting_team
          comment
          innings
          overs
          batsman {
            player_key
            ball_count
            runs
            is_dot_ball
            is_four
            is_six
            __typename
          }
          bowler {
            player_key
            ball_count
            runs
            extras
            is_wicket
            __typename
          }
          team_score {
            ball_count
            runs
            extras
            is_wicket
            __typename
          }
          fielders {
            player_key
            is_run_out
            is_stumps
            is_catch
            is_assists
            __typename
          }
          wicket {
            player_key
            wicket_type
            __typename
          }
          non_striker_key
          entry_time
          ball_play_status
          ball_tags
          updated_time
          __typename
        }
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }
    players {
      key
      value {
        player {
          key
          name
          jersey_name
          legal_name
          gender
          nationality {
            short_code
            code
            name
            official_name
            is_region
            __typename
          }
          date_of_birth
          seasonal_role
          roles
          batting_style
          bowling_style {
            arm
            pace
            bowling_type
            __typename
          }
          skills
          legal_name_v2
          jersey_name_v2
          __typename
        }
        score {
          key
          value {
            batting {
              score {
                runs
                balls
                fours
                sixes
                dot_balls
                strike_rate
                __typename
              }
              dismissal {
                overs
                team_runs
                wicket_number
                msg
                ball_key
                __typename
              }
              __typename
            }
            bowling {
              score {
                balls
                runs
                economy
                wickets
                extras
                maiden_overs
                overs
                balls_breakup {
                  dot_balls
                  wides
                  no_balls
                  fours
                  sixes
                  __typename
                }
                __typename
              }
              __typename
            }
            fielding {
              catches
              stumpings
              runouts
              __typename
            }
            __typename
          }
          __typename
        }
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }
    notes
    data_review {
      schedule
      venue
      result
      pom
      score
      players
      playing_xi
      score_reviewed_ball_index
      team_a
      team_b
      good_to_close
      note
      __typename
    }
    squad {
      key
      value {
        player_keys
        captain
        keeper
        playing_xi
        replacements {
          player_in
          replacement_reason
          in_innings
          player_out
          __typename
        }
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }
    estimated_end_date
    completed_date_approximate
    umpires {
      match_umpires {
        key
        name
        legal_name
        nationality {
          short_code
          code
          name
          official_name
          is_region
          __typename
        }
        __typename
      }
      tv_umpires {
        key
        name
        legal_name
        nationality {
          short_code
          code
          name
          official_name
          is_region
          __typename
        }
        __typename
      }
      reserve_umpires {
        key
        name
        legal_name
        nationality {
          short_code
          code
          name
          official_name
          is_region
          __typename
        }
        __typename
      }
      match_referee {
        key
        name
        legal_name
        nationality {
          short_code
          code
          name
          official_name
          is_region
          __typename
        }
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }
    weather
    __typename
  }
}
